EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Bastion of Purity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
For each Core enhancement in the Shintao tree, including this one, grants you the following passive effects:
+10 Positive Energy Spell Power +10 Positive Healing Amplification
Antirequisite: This enhancement cannot be taken at the same time as Improved Recovery I or II in the Half-Elf tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Protection from Tainted Creatures
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. These bonuses stack with all other bonuses to armor class and saving throws. Your attacks while Centered gain the Byeshk damage trait.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Iron Hand
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks while Centered gain the Cold Iron damage trait.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Argent Fist
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. Your unarmed attacks while Centered gain the Silver damage trait.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Touch the Void Dragon
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: Spend 30 Ki to gain a 1d4+1 bonus to all ability scores for one minute (Cooldown: 3 minute). Passive: +5 Melee Power, +1[W] while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: To Seek Perfection
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You continually seek physical and spiritual betterment, reaping many benefits. You gain +4 Wisdom. +15 Melee Power. You gain an additional +1 bonus to Armor Class and a +1 bonus to saving throws. +2[W] while Centered. If you have Meditation of War, +10 Melee and Ranged Power.

Effect.DisplayName: To Seek Perfection + Meditation of War

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Shintao Studies I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Reed in the Wind
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +[10/20/30]% Damage Cooldown: 15 seconds Ki Melee Attack: If you successfully damage your target you gain a +[3/6/9]% Insight bonus to Dodge for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Disciplined Training
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an option.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Deft Strikes
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +[3/6/10]% chance to make offhand attacks while Centered and wielding two weapons or fighting unarmed.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Fast Hands
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an option.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Negotiator
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate. Rank 3: The cooldown for Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate are reduced by 10%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Shintao Studies II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Smite Tainted Creature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You have the ability to expend Ki to deal devastating blows in melee. You gain twice your Wisdom modifier to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your Monk level. Targets will be locked in a tomb of jade on vorpal attacks (attack roll of 20 followed by critical confirmation) on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your Monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar creatures, Aberrations, and Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate. Activation Cost: 15 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds

DC.Name: Shintao: Smite Tainted Creature
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You have the ability to expend Ki to deal devastating blows in melee. You gain twice your Wisdom modifier to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your Monk level. Targets will be locked in a tomb of jade on vorpal attacks (attack roll of 20 followed by critical confirmation) on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your Monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar creatures, Aberrations, and Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Iron Skin
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While centered, you gain an additional [5/10/20] Physical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Elemental Ki Strikes
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select one of four attacks that have secondary after effects: (Activation Cost: 5 Ki. Cooldown: 3 seconds)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Eagle Claw Attack
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +20% Damage Cooldown: 3 seconds Fire Ki Melee Attack: Your attacks can shatter objects. You strike at weak points in your opponents armor or hide, applying four stacks of Armor Destruction. (Each stack reduces Armor Class by 1 and Fortification by 1% for 20 seconds. This effect can stack up to 15 times.)

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Iron
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage +1 Critical Multiplier +1 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 3 seconds Ki Melee Attack: You have imbued your attacks with extra force.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Knock on the Sky
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +10% Damage Cooldown: 3 seconds Ki Melee Attack: You strike your opponent, deflecting their momentum. Your enemy deals 4% less physical damage for 30 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Unbalancing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 3 seconds Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Shintao: Unbalancing Strike
DC.Description: Deals +30% Damage Cooldown: 3 seconds Water Ki Melee Attack: You have learned several joint strikes. You can attack these weak points of your opponent, throwing them off balance for a short period of time. This reduces their armor class by 2, applies a -10 penalty to their Balance skill, and renders them vulnerable to sneak attacks. A successful Reflex save negates this effect (DC 10 + Half Monk Level + Wisdom modifier + Trip modifiers). The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Quick Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +[10/20/30]% Damage Cooldown: [18/15/12] seconds Centered Melee Attack: You gain a [5/15/25]% Morale bonus to Doublestrike for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Shintao Studies III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and + 2 to Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Jade Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that is especially powerful against tainted creatures. On hitting a target, this attack increases their physical damage vulnerability by 10% and reduces their fortification by 25%. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your Monk level + Stun DC bonuses).
Aberrations, extraplanar creatures that are not classified as 'Lawful Outsiders', and Undead receive double this effect. On critical hits, a target will be locked in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + your Monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar creatures, Aberrations, and Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid their fate.
Activation Cost: 10 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds

DC.Name: Shintao: Jade Strike
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that is anathema to tainted creatures, that increases their physical damage vulnerability by 10% and reduces their fortification by 25%. A successful Will save negates this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Hands of Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an option.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand of Harm
EnhancementSelection.Description: +20 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 9 seconds Melee Attack: You strike your opponent down with a terrible curse, halving all positive energy healing done to the target, reducing its fortification by 25%. This attack automatically counts as a Critical Hit. Periodic Fortitude saves (14 + [Str/Dex/Wis] Modifier + Monk Level + Stun bonuses) to negate.

Requirement.Item: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Hand of Healing
EnhancementSelection.Description: You heal all nearby allies for 1d4 plus 1d4 per Monk level. Cooldown: 9 seconds.

Requirement.Item: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Fists of Light
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose an option

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dismissing Strike
EnhancementSelection.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that attempts to force an extra planar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom Modifier + Monk level + Stun bonuses). Cost: 25 Ki Cooldown: 15 seconds

Requirement.Item: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness

EnhancementSelection.Name: Fists of Light
EnhancementSelection.Description: Deals: +15% Damage Cooldown: 3 seconds You have chosen to follow the path if light. You seek to be in harmony with the world, and your training will reflect your philosophy. You can activate this ability to channel energy into your attack, dealing 4 to 24 additional Light damage, and applying a healing shield to your target which heals your allies that strike your target. On a vorpal strike (natural 20 followed by critical confirmation), you deal an additional 1 to 50 positive energy damage to undead. Both sets os damage scale with melee power.

Requirement.Item: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light

DC.Name: Shintao: Dismissing Strike
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform a melee attack that attempts to force an extra planar enemy back to its proper plane. A successful Will save negates this effect (DC = 10 + Wisdom Modifier + Monk level + Stun bonuses). Cost: 25 Ki Cooldown: 15 seconds

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Shintao Studies IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Attack and +2 to Damage while Centered.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Tomb of Jade
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform an attack that encases a target in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + Monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar creatures, Aberrations, and Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid this fate. Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 1 minute

DC.Name: Shintao: Tomb of Jade
DC.Description: Ki Melee Attack: You perform an attack that encases a target in a tomb of jade on a failed Will save (DC = 10 + Wisdom modifier + Monk level + stun bonuses). Extraplanar creatures, Aberrations, and Undead must succeed at two consecutive Will saves to avoid this fate.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Greater Hands of Mercy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an option.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Hand of Harm
EnhancementSelection.Description: Targets affected by your Hand of Harm are also Blinded and Nauseated until they save.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Greater Hand of Healing
EnhancementSelection.Description: Your hand of Healing now applies a Lesser Restoration effect and removes Blindness, Curses, and Diseases.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Instinctive Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You take [5/10/15]% less extra damage when struck while helpless. (Additional damage while helpless varies by difficulty setting from 5% to 25%.)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Constitution or Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Shintao Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While you are Centered, you gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Threat Range and Multiplier. Passive: You gain a +25% Competence bonus to Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Kukan-Do
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Ki Activate: You lock gazes with an enemy, stunning them for a short period of time on a failed Will save (DC 14 + Wisdom modifier + Monk level). Any effects that modify your Stunning Blow or Stunning Fist DC's also affect this ability. Sightless creatures are unaffected by this ability. Activation Cost: 25 Ki. Cooldown: 15 seconds

DC.Name: Shintao: Kukan-Do
DC.Description: Ki Activate: You lock gazes with an enemy, stunning them for a short period of time on a failed Will save. Any effects that modify your Stunning Blow or Stunning Fist DC's also affect this ability. Sightless creatures are unaffected by this ability.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Violence Begets Violence
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While Centered, when an opponent misses you in melee, you gain +1 critical threat range for 6 seconds. This stacks up to 5 times and is reset if you critically hit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Meditation of War
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Toggle: You gain +3 to Attack and Damage, as well as additional benefits in different stances: Air Stance: +2 to hit, +10% bonus to off-hand attack chance. Fire Stance: +2 to damage and to the DC's of your Stun, Sunder, and Trip abilities. Earth Stance: +10 to Physical Resistance and a +10% Quality bonus to Maximum Hit Points. Water Stance: +5 Maximum Dodge Bonus.
Note: Mutually exclusive with Stalwart stance and Sacred stance.

Stance.Name: Meditation of War
Stance.Description: Toggle: You gain +3 to Attack and Damage, as well as additional benefits in different stances: Air Stance: +2 to hit, +10% bonus to off-hand attack chance. Fire Stance: +2 to damage and to the DC's of your Stun, Sunder, and Trip abilities. Earth Stance: +10 to Physical Resistance and a +10% Quality bonus to Maximum Hit Points. Water Stance: +5 Maximum Dodge Bonus

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Shintao: Rise of the Phoenix
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Activate While Dead: The spirit of a phoenix burns within you. You may bring yourself back from death's door, as if affected by the Resurrection spell. This ability may only be used once per rest. Cooldown: 15 minutes
